name: JAN SEWA PRASHIKSHAN SANSTHAN

address: Jan Sewa Prashikshan Sansthan ,Village- Bhitari Post- Bhitari

briefDescription: Jan Sewa Prashikshan Sansthan(JSPS) is a registered voluntary organization operational in Ghazipur district of eastern UP. Jan Sewa Prashikshan Sansthan(JSPS) is a civil society organization registered under the social Act 1860. The organization was founded by a group of enthusiastic, liked minded citizens who recognized that there was a greater need to intervene in the present situation for the betterment of the community.Jan Sewa Prashikshan Sansthan(JSPS) is operational in eastern UP, which is one of the most backward regions of Uttar Pradesh.
